pageContext.claim: “Well, I hate the concept of regulation on media, but it's very unfair. You talk about the word collusion -- the collusion between the Democrats and these people is, it's ridiculous. It's hard to believe I won. If you think about it, I had Facebook, Google, Twitter, everybody against me. I have -- the media is almost totally against me. And yet I won.”
pageContext.analysis: There's no evidence that the media or the social media companies did anything to thwart Trump's chances at being elected. Some have even suggested that CNN's coverage played a role in helping Trump get elected.
